subject: Thanks  — Let's Get Your Restaurant on Zomato!
body:
Hi there,

Thanks for chatting with me today! I heard you're from your company and looking to grow your restaurant business.

You're a great fit for Zomato Partner Platform. I've reserved a demo slot for you:
→ Tomorrow at 3:00 PM IST

Reply to this email to confirm or pick a better time.

Looking forward to helping you get more orders!
Best,
Aarav
SDR @ Zomato
